metadata.title: CVE-2018-1000825 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: FreeCol version <= nightly-2018-08-22 contains a XML External Entity (XXE)vulnerability in FreeColXMLReader parser that can result in Disclosure ofconfidential data, denial of service, SSRF, port scanning. This attackappear to be exploitable via Freecol file.

criterions.comment: freecol package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
